attributes.action: respectfully ask the London Borough of Hounslow to reconsider their plans to demolish the former Feltham Hotel (latterly the Feltham Community Association / Feltham People's Centre) building in Feltham High Street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HOUNSLOW Council is planning to bulldoze the historic Feltham People's Centre and replace it with a car park for its employees.

The astonishing decision to knock down the council-owned building in Feltham High Street comes after plans to replace it with a skills centre fell by the wayside due to lack of funding.

In May councillors expressed regret at potentially losing the 1930s building from the conservation area but argued that the skills centre was so important to the town that special allowances should be made.

Now the decision to bulldoze the former Feltham Hotel – which was used by the Feltham Community Association (FCA) for 36 years – and replace it with a car park for council workers has been met with fury in the town.
